Package org.jungrapht.visualization.layout.util

Interface EdgeAccessor<V,​E>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GraphElementAccessor<V,​E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RadiusGraphElementAccessor, ShapePickSupport
    public interface EdgeAccessor<V,​E>
    Interface for coordinate-based selection of graph edges.
    Author:
    Tom Nelson

    • Method Summary

      E getEdge​(LayoutModel<V> layoutModel, double x, double y)

      • getEdge

        E getEdge​(LayoutModel<V> layoutModel,
          double x,
          double y)
        Returns the edge, if any, associated with (x, y).

        x - the x coordinate of the pick point
        y - the y coordinate of the pick point
